1.name: Blank
1.desc: Blank Domain. Nothing will happen in this domain.

2.name: Respite
2.desc: Respite Domain. You can enhance Blessings, download characters, and reset characters in this domain.

3.name: Combat
3.desc: Combat Domain. Defeat enemies in this domain to receive Blessings.

4.name: Combat: Swarm
4.desc: Special Combat Domain. Defeat Swarm enemies in this domain to receive Blessings of Propagation.

5.name: Elite
5.desc: Elite Domain. Defeat Elite Enemies in this domain for a chance to receive 1 Blessing of 1- to 3-star rarity.

6.name: Adventure
6.desc: Adventure Domain. Complete the various challenges in this domain to obtain rewards.

7.name: Reward
7.desc: Reward Domain. Select from different rewards in this domain.

8.name: Occurrence
8.desc: Occurrence Domain. Different outcomes can be achieved in this domain based on your choices.

9.name: Occurrence: Swarm
9.desc: Special Occurrence Domain. The Swarm's alertness can be affected by the choices you make in this domain. The higher the Swarm's alertness, the more dangerous the Special Occurrence in the domain becomes.

11.name: Boss
11.desc: Boss Domain. Defeat the Boss in this domain to pass this plane.

12.name: Boss: Swarm
12.desc: Special Boss Domain. Defeating Swarm: True Sting (Complete) in this domain can clear this run of Simulated Universe.

13.name: Transaction
13.desc: Transaction Domain. Consume Cosmic Fragments in this domain to purchase Blessings and Curios.

15.name: Boss
15.desc: Boss Domain. Defeat the Boss in this domain to pass this plane.

16.name: Intra-Cognition
16.desc: Special Occurrence Domain. You can adjust your Intra-Cognition value in this domain and also progress toward different Secrets.

17.name: Occurrence: Abnormal
17.desc: Special Occurrence Domain. You are more likely to encounter occurrences with higher risks in this domain.
